summary.span: Encapsulates a collection of controls for use by the class.

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of controls for use by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是从零开始的索引的集合使用类来保存所有分配给工具栏的控件。The is a zero-based indexed collection used by the class to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 使用方法将添加各个按钮和方法将其删除。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete them. 调用方法从集合中移除所有的按钮。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化和三个控件。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给工具栏和工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此代码需要已创建。This code requires that a has already been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除中指定的位置。The method removes the at the specified location in the . 如果你想要删除所有控件从该集合，使用方法。If you want to remove all controls from the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除最后一个上。The following code example removes the last on a . 要移除的工具栏按钮的索引值设置为等于属性减 1，因为集合是一个从零开始的索引。The index value of the toolbar button being removed is set equal to the property, minus one, since the collection is a zero-based index.
